cards.name: Asharo's Handmaiden
cards.originalText: Whenever you cast an Inscription spell, you may choose target creature you control. If you do, as that Inscription resolves, exile it inscribed onto that creature instead of putting it anywhere else.

rulings.text: The timing of this triggered ability is as follows: The target is chosen as the ability triggers. You choose whether or not the Inscription will be exiled when the trigger resolves. If you do and that creature is no longer on the battlefield when that Inscription resolves, the Inscription will be exiled but not inscribed onto anything. Once the ability has triggered, removing Asharo's Handmaiden has no effect on the ability's resolution (unless it happens to be the target).
